topic.title: NUMBER OF COLORECTAL METASTASES IN LIVER
topic.shortdesc: NUMBER OF COLORECTAL METASTASES IN LIVER is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the total number of colorectal metastases identified in the resected liver (surgical removal of a portion of the liver) during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
